main.bio: I am a (MERN) Fullstack Web Developer with a background in art and design. Lookng to impliment and grow my skills in both front end and back with a focus in orchestrating minimalist design and lean UI experiance.

testimonials.text: Oscar was one of the first people I had the pleasure of working with on a project at SMU. He is truly inovative and is always up for putting in the hard work. He has great ideas and never shies away from putting extra time into something that has proven to be difficult. He is a very reliable team member and set the bar high for furture group members. Anyone would be truly lucky to have Oscar on their team!

I was lucky to work with Oscar on a project to build an Android/IOS app that aids in driver navigation using an interactive map and voice to text software. A skilled and energetic web developer, Oscar is an effective team player and well motivated self starter with a strong knowledge of React, Node js, and React Native Expo. His dedication to creating a successful product was a great help in the creation of our app.

We worked in two different projects together. I really enjoyed working with him. He puts real effort to his work and gets good results. He is very skilled and effective team member. He communicates well with other members. He is skilled front-end developer and a quick learner.
